articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of People's Security Meets General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Ministry of People's Security Meets General Secretary of C.C., LPRP 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK led by Minister Choe Pu Il on a visit to Laos Friday met and had a talk with Bounnhang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP).
					 The general secretary said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is invariably carrying forward the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries forged by the preceding leaders of the two countries.
					
					 The Lao people are rejoiced over the successes made by the Korean people in bolstering the national power and developing socio-economy, he said.
					
					 He extended full support to the just cause of the Korean people on behalf of the Lao party and state and hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop forever.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and great success in the work to lead the DPRK to socialism.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of DPRK Ministry of People's Security and Lao Ministry of Public Security Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of DPRK Ministry of People's Security and Lao Ministry of Public Security Held
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- There took place talks between a delegation of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK National Defence Commission and a delegation of the Lao Ministry of Public Security in Vientiane on Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the Ministry of People's Security led by Minister Choe Pu Il and the DPRK ambassador to Laos and from the Lao side members of the delegation of the Lao Ministry of Public Security led by Minister Somkeo Sylavong.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting cooperation between the security organs of the two countries and issues of mutual concern.
					
					 An agreement on mutual cooperation between the two ministries was signed.
					
					 On the same day the Lao minister hosted a reception for the DPRK delegation.

articles.title: Anniversary of State Planning and Statistic Organs Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of State Planning and Statistic Organs Observed
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the Central Youth Hall Saturday to mark the 70th anniversary of the founding of state planning and statistic organs.
					 President Kim Il Sung was very busy building new democratic Korea after its liberation but founded the first central planning and statistic organ on March 6, Juche 35 (1946) on the basis of feats and experience gained in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 The establishment of the central planning and statistic organ helped start a new history of planned economy, a new history of popular statistics which could put overall economic development of the country under control in a uniform way and develop it at a rapid tempo.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the President, the socialist system of planning and statistic work was established, ranks of officials were built and the material and technical foundation was consolidated. As a result, the socialist planning and statistics have performed their mission and role as a powerful weapon for the revolution and construction.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Intellectuals
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Intellectuals 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to People's Scientist, Academician, Prof. and Dr. So Pyong Hwa, researcher at Hamhung University of Hydraulic Engineering, on his 80th birthday, and Merited Scientist, Prof. and Dr. Pak Ryong Ung, researcher at Kye Ung Sang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University, on his 70th birthday.
					 So Pyong Hwa successfully solved difficult and complicated scientific and technical problems arising in important construction projects including large-scale hydro-power station, tideland, harbor and  river and irrigation projects wrote many textbooks, reference books and papers and trained his students as competent holders of academic degrees.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un invited him to attend national conferences including national conference of scientists and technicians and bestowed upon him the honor of being recipients of state commendations.
					
					 Born in an alien land, Pak Ryong Ung devoted himself to the education of students and scientific and researches for decades.
					
					 He devoted all his wisdom and energy to the work for publishing books "Complete Book on Kimilsungia" and "Complete Book on Kimjongilia" of national value and researches into the wide dissemination of immortal flowers so that they are kept in full bloom.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at Adoption of UNSC "Resolution"
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at Adoption of UNSC "Resolution"
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Taken aback by the DPRK's ever-growing military strength, the U.S. and its followers cooked up another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the name of the United Nations. 
					 Such action is now arousing the surging hatred and wrath from among the citizens in the DPRK.
					
					 Hyon Ki Chong, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized such improper "resolutions".
					
					 The human history witnessed more than 2 000 nuclear tests and 9 000 satellite launches, but no resolution was adopted at the UN Security Council to put a ban on them.
					
					 It is a disgrace to the world community to allow such high-handed practice of the U.S. and other big powers possessed of many satellites and nuclear warheads.
					
					 We will resolutely use all means and methods to take powerful, merciless and physical counteractions against the hostile forces' anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 Dr. Kang Chol of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 The sanction hysterics of the U.S. can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 The entire world should break the inveterate habit of it regarding the sanctions as "a cure for all". 
					
					 It will be impossible to expect peaceful future of mankind when the U.S. is allowed to go scot-free as it does not hesitate to put sanctions on not only nations hostile toward it but also its "strategic partners" and allies, if they incur its displeasure.
					
					 All the countries and nations should direct the spearhead of sanctions to the U.S., an evil empire, if they are to set right the wrong tendency of the world where justice and impartiality are violated and double standards and injustice are rampant.
					
					 The DPRK will clearly show how it puts an end to the crime-woven history of the UN dominated by the U.S. and other big powers and the dolts toeing their lines and establishes international justice and impartiality.

articles.title: Production of Farm Machines on Increase
articles.content:
Production of Farm Machines on Increase
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Factories and enterprises under the Management Bureau of the Farm Machine Industry in the DPRK have made big successes in turning out farm machines and spare parts with a 70-day campaign as an occasion.
					 The Haeju Trailing Farm Machine Factory developed 11 kinds of machines like potato harvester, combined plowing machine and spraying machine. And the Hamhung Trailing Farm Machine Factory concentrates all efforts on producing 4 kinds of farm machines including motor sprayer.
					
					 Tractor spare parts factories in Anju, Jongju and other parts of the country have also fulfilled their daily production plan 110 percent.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has been pushed forward at factories and enterprises under the management bureau to produce and upgrade 17 kinds of equipment like CNC-based profiler.

articles.title: Successes Made in Producing Electronic Goods
articles.content:
Successes Made in Producing Electronic Goods
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The on-going 70-day campaign stimulates factories and institutes under the Ministry of Electronics Industry in the DPRK to develop high-quality electronic goods and increase their production.
					 The Taedonggang TV Set Factory has over-fulfilled its daily quota over 120 percent from the first day of the campaign.
					
					 The Institute of Electronic Goods under the Electronic Gadget Management Bureau developed a voltage-frequency regulator for controlling the speed of asynchronous motor by its own efforts. The motor is smaller and lighter than existing ones and has a long serviceable life.
					
					 The Designing Institute of Electronics and Automation presented a new wind-powered generator. And the Pyongyang Automation Appliances Factory speeds up the production of quality deep-freezer and electric fan.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Agrarian Reform Law Enforcement in DPRK
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Agrarian Reform Law Enforcement in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Seventy years has passed since the Agrarian Reform Law was promulgated in Korea on March 5, Juche 35 (1946).
					 The promulgation of the law was a historic event in the country as this gratified the cherished desire of its peasants to own their land.
					
					At the time of Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, the country's population was mostly made up of peasants, who had long desired to do farm in their own land.
					
					 So, to properly settle the agrarian problem was of great importance in rescuing the peasants from century-old backwardness and poverty and building a democratic, new Korea.
					
					 That's why President Kim Il Sung chose the agrarian reform as the first affair for democratic reforms in the liberated country after the foundation of the Party and the establishment of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea.
					
					 After acquainting himself in detail with the countryside situation and the desire of landless peasants, he made it sure that the Agrarian Reform Law was adopted and promulgated.
					
					 Now the agricultural workers in the DPRK recall those days with deep emotion, hardening their will to contribute to the country's prosperity by bringing bumper crops under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Taesongsan Team Successful at Paektusan Sports Games
articles.content:
Taesongsan Team Successful at Paektusan Sports Games
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Taesongsan Sports Team came first in total standings at the recent Paektusan Prize Sports Games for the second straight year, grabbing its rotating trophy cup.
					 The team bagged 20 gold, 8 silver and 14 bronze medals in 60-odd events, especially holding the lead in winter sports events such as ice hockey, speed skating, figure skating and short track speed skating.
					
					 Sports experts expect that the team will continue to prove successful at the future Paektusan Prize Sports Games and Osandok Prize Sports Contest with main stress on winter sports events.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns Park Geun Hye for Crimes Committed in Three Years of Her Office
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns Park Geun Hye of Crimes Committed in Three Years of Her Office
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye's three years in office are full of crimes she committed by kowtowing to outsiders, betraying the nation, bringing the north-south relations to a total collapse and blocking the democratization of the south Korean society.
					 South Korea ruled by Park today is a colony of the U.S. and shackled even to neighboring big powers in the true sense of words. It now reminds one of the period dating back to the late 19th century and the early 20th century when Korea went to ruin due to the scrambles among big powers. 
					
					 Regarding dependence on outsiders as her inborn disposition, Park has left the dignity and interests of the nation to the tender mercy of outsiders and escalated confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 No sooner had she been elected "president" of south Korea than she phoned the U.S. president to fawn upon him by telling him that she would put the U.S.-south Korea alliance on a higher stage through close cooperation with Washington. She made her first foreign tour of the U.S. after taking office where she shamelessly promised her American master to unconditionally tailor her "north policy" and other diplomatic and security policies to Washington's north Korea policy and diplomacy.
					
					 She created her diplomacy and security team with confrontation maniacs who earned ill-fame as military gangsters, saying that she absolutely trusted the judgment and decision of the military. She thus left all the matters of the north-south relations to be handled by them and reduced them to playthings of confrontation and war maniacs.
					
					 Whenever she opened her mouth to decry the north's nuclear deterrence for self-defence, she talked rubbish that "the north's nuclear weapons should never be allowed" and "it is sheer illusion for the north to implement the line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts." She solicited international cooperation during her foreign junkets, crying out for "the north's dismantlement of nuclear weapons."
					
					 Crying out for "adhering to principle", she brought to rupture the hard-won north-south authorities talks and, furthermore, totally closed the Kaesong Industrial Zone though her predecessors dared not do so.
					
					 Her regime, in collusion with the U.S., got desperate in its moves for a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 It together with the U.S. mapped out the "tailored deterrent strategy" designed to mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK by mobilizing even mainland-based nuclear force of the U.S., the plan for "jointly coping with local war" aimed to lead the DPRK to an armed clash and the provocative "4D operation plan" to attack its nuclear and missile bases.
					
					 Pursuant to those war scenarios, they staged Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Ulji Freedom Guardian and other large-scale joint military drills every year.
					
					 Since the emergence of the present regime, ultra-modern U.S. nuclear war hardware and strike means including nuclear carrier Nimitz, George Washington, nuclear submarine Cheyenne and B-52 strategic bombers, B-2 stealth strategic bombers and F-22 stealth fighters are frequenting south Korea and its vicinity for nuclear war drills. Consequently, south Korea has turned into a U.S. exhibition ground of cutting-edge nuclear war hardware and strike means.
					
					 The Park regime has massively introduced U.S.-made weaponry under the pretext of coping with non-existent "provocation and threat from the north" during three years of office.
					
					 It spent hundreds of millions of U.S. dollars for purchasing U.S.-made weaponry such as various type missiles, helicopters and airships. In addition to it, a stupendous amount of funds were spent for buying high-altitude spy drones for establishing MD system, SAMs and Aegis destroyer combat system.
					
					 It extended for an indefinite period the transfer of OPECON scheduled in 2015 to turn south Korea into a permanent colony and military base of the U.S.
					
					 It is busy staging together with the U.S. madcap war drills aimed at preemptive attack on the north almost every day under the pretext of its bolstering of nuclear deterrent and satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is now introducing ultra-modern nuclear strike means and special-ops forces which earned an ill-fame in wars of aggression overseas in the past, openly talking about "beheading operation" and "high-density strikes" against the DPRK. 
					
					 Most recently the puppet forces staged a large-scale naval firing maneuver under the simulated conditions of "enemy armed provocation" and "surprise attack and occupation of five islands in the West Sea. In the wake of opening to media a large-scale combat equipment mobile drill of the 20th mechanized infantry division of the puppet ground force, south Korean and U.S. forces conducted the south Korea-U.S. combined wartime reinforcement rehearsal aimed at the rapid deployment of U.S. reinforcing force in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Due to the reckless provocative moves of the Park group, the north-south relations have plunged into nadir and the situation in the Korean Peninsula has reached the worst phase that should never be overlooked.
					
					 The Park group of traitors is, indeed, a source of trouble to the nation.
					
					 It should be rooted out in time.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Accused of Her Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, addressing the recent "event commemorating the March 1 movement", again took issue with the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK and blustered that "it is impossible to break the north's will to develop nuclear weapons" with the existing mode of counter-action and she would continue to "take such high-handed measures against the north" as closing the Kaesong Industrial Zone.
					 However, she kept mum about the Japanese reactionaries' desperate moves to deny the past crimes and stage a comeback to Korea but talked rubbish that the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was "finally and irreversibly settled."
					
					 Commenting on this, newspapers here Saturday observe: What Park uttered is no more than rigmarole of a rustic old woman to embellish the crimes she has committed by blocking the inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation and selling off national interests to outsiders and to justify her criminal moves for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that such behavior of Park Geun Hye is no more than frenzy of a psychopath much upset by the powerful nuclear deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 With no desperate efforts can Park, a prostitute serving the American master, tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and block the advance of its service personnel and people dynamically advancing along the road of Songun, the newspaper stresses.
					
					 Minju Joson says that Park more dead than alive deserves curse and denunciation by all Koreans even after death as she is escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, pursuing sycophancy and treachery and seeking a war against them.

articles.title: Leading Newspapers Laud Great Leaders' Feats Performed in Socialist Rural Construction
articles.content:
Leading Newspapers Laud Great Leaders' Feats Performed in Socialist Rural Construction
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Seven decades have passed since the promulgation of the Agrarian Reform Law on March 5, 1946 in the DPRK. This period represents a proud history in which epochal changes have taken place in the socialist rural construction thanks to President Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's Juche-oriented idea on the rural construction and their energetic leadership.
					 Leading newspapers of the DPRK Saturday say this in editorials.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the great leaders explored the untrodden path of socialist rural construction with their gifted wisdom and outstanding leadership art, setting an example of the times in solving the rural issues in their whole course of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Under the leadership of the President the two phases of complicated social revolution were successfully carried out in the rural areas and the cause of socialist rural construction could make a steady advance along the orbit of Juche despite the turbulence of the complicated international situation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il regarded it as a historic task of proving the advantages and invincibility of socialism to settle the rural question and energetically led the work to consolidate the rural position and develop in depth the three revolutions- ideological, technical and cultural- as required by the developing reality.
					
					 The world knows no such leaders as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who attached so great importance to the peasant issue and agriculture issue and settled them most successfully and led the rural construction, walking roads of fields of the country all their lives. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the agricultural workers and other people all over the country have the firm faith and will to eternally glorify the immortal feats performed by the great leaders in the land administration and thus give steady continuity to the fresh history of the fields visited by bumper harvests.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Fated to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Fated to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) --The Chongwadae of the Park Geun Hye group and the White House, the cesspool of evils, are fated to collapse, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 From an objective point of view, the south Korean puppet group is destined to meet its doom, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 All the successive traitors of south Korea who challenged the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK, backed by the U.S., have gone to their graves together with their masters without exception.
					
					 The same was true of traitor Syngman Rhee who played the role of running dog of the U.S. which divided the Korean nation.
					
					 In the 1950s he carried out "the northern expedition," blustering that he would have breakfast in Haeju, lunch in Pyongyang and supper in Sinuiju, backed by the U.S. which threatened to use A-bombs. But he sustained a bitter defeat.
					
					 Tragic was the end of the "yusin" dictator Park Chung-Hee who challenged the three principles of national reunification, reneging on the July 4 joint statement under the U.S. scenario of "two Koreas."
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak, vicious enemy in the June 15 era of reunification, cried out for "seeking the change of the social system in the north" together with the U.S. unless the north gives up its nuclear and missile programs. But he only faced severe punishment and was thrown to the fringes of the era.
					
					 Laying bare the crimes committed by traitor Park Geun Hye, the article notes that she is no longer entitled to exist on this land.
					
					 What remains to be done by the Park Geun Hye group which deserves a severe punishment for sycophancy towards the U.S. and thrice-cursed treachery is to go to graves, following in the footsteps of predecessors.

articles.title: Campaigns for Erecting More Girl Statues Expand in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaigns for Erecting More Girl Statues Expand in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- 8 heads of local self-governing organizations in south Korea issued a statement in Seoul on March 1 in support of the erection of girl statues, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 In the statement, they expressed their will to erect girl statues in overseas sister and friendship cities together with 50 local self-governing organizations.
					
					  People from all walks of life of south Korea are strongly protesting against Japan's arrogance and the puppet regime's humiliating act.
					
					 The Committee for Promoting the Erection of Girl Statue for Peace by the Younger Generation declared its will to erect girl statues before the Japanese consulate in Pusan City and other areas and launched a practical action.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Punishing Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions issued the "twenty-point motion calling for general elections" on Thursday demanding the punishment of the Park Geun Hye puppet regime for abusing human rights by pushing the people into dire distress.
					 It said that it is necessary to put an end to the times of despair characterized by uneasiness and horror due to dismissal, unemployment and threat of war, far from dream and hope on the threshold of the election of "National Assemblymen" in April.
					
					 It stressed that the Park regime working hard with bloodshot eyes to grant privilege to big businesses and retrogressively revise the labor law should be certainly punished on behalf of the workers and people.
					
					 It added that it will send the motion to every political party.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korea Accused of Mulling Staging Military Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korea Accused of Mulling Staging Military Exercises against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean people concerned about the destiny of the nation and desirous of the peace and reunification of the country should get united as one to foil the U.S. vicious ambition for invading the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' adventurous moves for a war against the DPRK.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said this in a statement on March 4.
					
					 The statement said the U.S. and south Korean authorities responsible for the constant tension in the Korean Peninsula are mulling staging the largest-ever military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 despite the strong protest at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities' moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK have been the main factor of threatening the peace in the Korean Peninsula and stability in Northeast Asia, the statement noted.
					
					 It is an urgent task to frustrate the war moves against the DPRK, the statement said, calling for actively joining in the nationwide struggle to meet the challenges of the anti-reunification forces and usher in the new era of independence and reunification.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Their Provocative Actions against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Their Provocative Actions against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China released a statement on February 26.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are making last-ditch efforts, taken back by the first H-bomb test and successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 of Juche Korea.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are fully determined to mercilessly punish anyone trying to hurt the headquarters of the revolution even a bit, it noted, adding: The federation will fight without the slightest mercy against the provocative moves of the hostile forces, in unity with the compatriots in the homeland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Nigerian, Bangladeshi Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Nigerian, Bangladeshi Newspapers
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Bangladeshi newspapers carried articles praising the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Nigerian Observer on Feb. 11 in an article titled "Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il" introduced the Songun leadership feats he performed in consolidating the politico-ideological position and defence capability of the country in every way with his invincible Songun politics.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk on Feb. 12 in an article titled "Legacy of leader Kim Jong Il" said:
					
					 He left his great feats guaranteeing the eternal foundation and rosy future of socialist Korea as a legacy.
					
					 He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious guiding force, turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist state and strengthened the Korean People's Army into a matchless army.
					
					 The great exploits he performed all his life will shine forever as the most valuable legacy firmly ensuring the victory of the socialist cause in the DPRK and the accomplishment of the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed in Ecuador, Chile and South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed in Ecuador, Chile and South Africa
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Ecuador, Chile and South Africa between Feb. 12 and 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu said that Kim Jong Il was the peerless patriot who defended the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation and provided the Korean people with happy life.
					
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification noted that Kim Jong Il was not only the tender-hearted father of the Korean people but also the most outstanding statesman and great revolutionary praised by progressives. 
					
					 The representative of the Chile Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that a decisive turn was made in carving out the destiny of the people as Kim Jong Il was born on Feb. 16, 1942.
					
					 He made journeys of devotion till the last moments of his life in order to turn the DPRK into a socialist power and made sure that miracles and innovations were made in all fields by dint of ideology, the representative noted.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at meetings held at Gauteng and Mfumalanga provinces of South Africa.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar in India and celebrations in Venezuela and Mexico on Feb. 19 and 20 observed the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Harising Khang, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by progressives as he firmly defended peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and other parts of Northeast Asia and the world.
					
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that it is the great feats of Kim Jong Il that he developed the Juche idea into the eternal guiding idea in the era of independence and defended the cause of socialism.
					
					 Benigno Gonzales Villasana, chairman of the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, praised the feats of Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un guiding the service personnel and people to victory, true to the cause of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Websites
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Russian Websites
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- Russian websites in special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos observed his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star.)
					 An article titled "Eternal Chairman of National Defence Commission" was posted on Irkutskblogspot. ru, a website in Irkutsk. It said that Kim Jong Il established the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot and provided a legal guarantee for the Songun politics, thus laying a foundation for the country's eternal prosperity.
					
					 Such articles as "Greatest joy of Comrade Kim Jong Il" and "General and soldiers" were posted on another website Patrioty Moskva.
					
					 They told that Kim Jong Il, possessed of warm love for the people as his inborn disposition, devoted his all to the people's happiness.
					
					 An article praising his life was posted on the website of the Communist Party "Communists of Russia".

articles.title: Japanese Organization Urges Government to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Organization Urges Government to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- The Japan Committee for the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Feb. 16 in demand of the lift of Japan's independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					 Saying that the Japanese government's sanctions against the DPRK should be immediately lifted, the statement noted:
					
					 What the DPRK launched is clearly a satellite as recognized by everyone.
					
					 Satellite launch is the legitimate right of all sovereign states.
					
					 Therefore, it is utterly unreasonable for the Japanese government to criticize the DPRK's satellite launch, terming it a "missile test-fire".
					
					 The Japanese government is countering the DPRK's peaceful space development by force of arms.
					
					 Sanctions and military step will never help ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula and improve the Japan-DPRK relations.
					
					 Dialogue and sanctions can never go together.
					
					 As we want the earlier normalization of the Japan-DPRK relations, we urge the government to immediately retract its sanctions plan but opt for a sincere dialogue with the DPRK.

articles.title: It Is Very Unreasonable to Take Issue with DPRK's Satellite Launch: Nigerian Political Party
articles.content:
It Is Very Unreasonable to Take Issue with DPRK's Satellite Launch: Nigerian Political Party
 Pyongyang, March 5 (KCNA) -- It is very unreasonable for anyone to pull up the DPRK over its satellite launch to attain his ulterior purpose despite the full explanation of the satellite's peaceful mission by the DPRK.
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria said this in its statement on Feb. 27.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The hostile forces' adventurous attempts can never be allowed.
					
					 It is a common sense that any country uses a carrier rocket to put a satellite into its orbit.
					
					 If it is a sovereign state, it has an equal right in the international arena, regardless of its territory size.
					
					 The People's Progressive Party of Nigeria resolutely denounces the hostile forces for their military actions leading the situation in the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 They should immediately stop the dangerous military adventure in order to ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula and other parts of the region.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente centroafricano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente centroafricano 
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion a Faustin Archange Touadera, electo presidente de la Republica Centroafricana.
					El remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo nuevos exitos en las labores para la estabilidad politica, la unidad nacional y el desarrollo independiente.
					
					Y expresa una conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se fortalezcan y se desarrollen mas tambien en el futuro.

articles.title: Sostenidas conversaciones entre delegaciones de MINSEP de RPDC y MSDL
articles.content:
Sostenidas conversaciones entre delegaciones de MINSEP de RPDC y MSDL
Pyongyang, 5 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 4 en Vientiane las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Ministerio de Seguridad y Defensa de Laos.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los miembros de la delegacion de MINSEP de la RPDC encabezada por su ministro Choe Pu Il, y el embajador coreano acreditado en Laos, por la parte coreana y por la laosiana, los miembros de la delegacion de MSDL encabezada por su ministro Somkeo Sylavong.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron los criterios de estrechar mas las cooperaciones entre los organos de seguridad de ambos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					Y quedo rubricado el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion mutua entre el MINSEP del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y el MSDL de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					
					El mismo dia, el ministro laosiano ofrecio un banquete en honor de la delegacion coreana.
